data.name: Sonucido: The Mage - A Dungeon Crawler by Daniel da Silva
data.detailed_description:
Find your way through the depths of Sonucido in this turn-based Dungeon Crawler RPG!

Sonucido: The Mage is inspired by recent Dungeon Crawlers but instead of a party you control one character.

Your goal is clear: Find the mage!



  • Turn-Based Combat: Easy to learn but hard to master. No battle-dancing!
  • Slay Enemies: Defeat a variety of enemies with different weaknesses and strengths.
  • Replayability: Discover multiple endings and different paths through the depths of Sonucido.
  • Exploration: Look around and find potions, optional side-quests, secrets and more.
  • Bold Game Design: No inventory management, no novel-length text walls, no 30 minute tutorial.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Sonucido: The Mage is a grid-based, turn-based Dungeon Crawler RPG. Find the mage in the depths of Sonucido!
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Turkish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-6100 / Athlon 3000G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 / Vega 3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-8100 / Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 / RX 550
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any recent distro should work
  • Processor: i3-6100 / Athlon 3000G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 / Vega 3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: I used MX Linux for developing the game
  • Processor: i3-8100 / Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 / RX 550
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
